name: grubby-hanky
short_effect: Appears in the Café Warehouse on Sunday; return to the customer with a Patrat on Thursday.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A handkerchief dropped by a regular at Café Warehouse. It smells faintly like a Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A handkerchief dropped by a regular at Café Warehouse. It smells faintly like a Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A handkerchief dropped by a regular at Café Warehouse. It smells faintly like a Pokémon.
